comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: As of December 1915, according to the New-York tribune. (New York [N.Y.]), 11 Dec. 1915, page 3. chroniclingamerica.loc.gov/lccn/sn83030214/1915-12-11/ed-... Semple was assistant counsel for the Public Service Commission.

comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: In 1921, he was member of a new Transit and Public Service Commission, see photo in the New-York tribune., April 27, 1921, Page 8.
